claim: Nearly 40 million units were sold by Amaze Entertainment.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amaze Entertainment was a video game developer from the United States that developed over 100 games in its ten-year history  (  selling nearly 40 million units  )  , for several video game platforms , with headquarters located in Kirkland , Washington .

claim: Nearly 40 million units were sold by Amaze Entertainment.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Foundation 9 announced on July 21 , 2008 that it in an effort to clarify the branding for its three Amaze Entertainment studios that they were reinstating the names of the individual studios , The Fizz Factor , Griptonite Games , and the Kirkland studio would remain as Amaze Entertainment .
